game.title: The Forest Treasure Quest
game.objective: Uncover the AncientTreasure in the Forest.
game.description: A long-forgotten quest awaits. Seek the village elder for guidance.
game.reward: Gold coins, magical artifacts, and a place in history
game.quest-giver: The Wise Sage of Green Hollow

task.objective: Acquire the Forest Map from the village elder.
task.description: The map's secret lies within the old oak tree by the well.
task.location: Oak Tree by the Well, Green Hollow

task.objective: Trace the map to the hidden treasure cave.
task.description: The cave entrance is guarded by a riddle. Solve it!

task.objective: Confirm your treasure's location and claim it!
task.description: Once inside, you'll find a chest filled with wealth.
task.location: Chest at the Cave's Inner Chamber
